SEARCH
Package com.nookure.staff.api.database

Class AbstractPluginConnection

java.lang.Object
com.nookure.staff.api.database.AbstractPluginConnection
public abstract class AbstractPluginConnection extends Object
This class represents a connection to the database. Use connect(DatabaseConfig, ClassLoader) to connect to the database.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public abstract void connect(@NotNull @NotNull DatabaseConfig config, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Connects to the database.

      This method should be called before any other method. If the connection is already established, this method should do nothing. If the connection is not established, this method should establish it. If the connection is not established, and the connection fails, the plugin should try using SQLite. If the connection is not established, and the connection fails, and SQLite fails, the plugin should disable itself.

      Parameters:
      config - the database config
      See Also:
      • DatabaseConfig

    • close

      public abstract void close()
      Closes the connection to the database.

      This method should be called when the plugin is disabled. If the connection is already closed, this method should do nothing.

    • getStorm

      @NotNull public abstract @NotNull com.craftmend.storm.Storm getStorm()
      Returns the Storm instance. This should be called after connect(DatabaseConfig, ClassLoader).

      If the connection is not established, this method should throw an exception. If the connection is established, this method should return the Storm instance.

      Returns:
      the Storm instance

    • getConnection

      @NotNull public abstract @NotNull Connection getConnection()
      Returns the connection to the database. this should be called after connect(DatabaseConfig, ClassLoader).

      If the connection is not established, this method should throw an exception. If the connection is established, this method should return the connection.

      Returns:
      the connection to the database

    • getEbeanDatabase

      public abstract io.ebean.Database getEbeanDatabase()
      Returns the Ebean database. This should be called after connect(DatabaseConfig, ClassLoader).

      If the connection is not established, this method should throw an exception. If the connection is established, this method should return the Ebean database.

      Returns:
      the Ebean database

    • reload

      public abstract void reload(@NotNull @NotNull DatabaseConfig config, @NotNull @NotNull ClassLoader classLoader)
      Reloads the connection to the database.
      Parameters:
      config - the database config
      classLoader - the class loader
